title: Offers | Avalara | Arista | CapitalOne | Flipkart | Enphase | Epam | Wayfair | OCI
content:
Education: B.E Computer Science and Engineering(Tier 2)
Years of Experience: 4
Prior Experience: SDE2 at a Fintech (Bengaluru)
Previous Compensation: 26 LPA ( 20 Base + 6 Bonus)

**Offers**:
Company: **Flipkart**
Title/Level: SDE2
Base: 30LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 15L(ESOP)(4 years)
Perf Bonus: 10%
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 37LPA

Company: **Avalara**
Title/Level: SSE
Base: 31LPA
Joining Bonus: 3L
Stock bonus: 0
Bonus: 4L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 38LPA

Company: **Enphase Energy**
Title/Level: SDE2
Base: 32LPA
Performance Bonus: 2L
Stock bonus: 20L RSU (4 years)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 39LPA

Company: **Epam Systems**
Title/Level: SDE2
Base: 35LPA
Joining Bonus: 2L
Pf And Gratuity: 2L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 39LPA

Company: **Arista Networks**
Title/Level: SSE
Base: 32LPA
Relocation bonus: 2L
Signing Bonus: 3L(aniversay)
Stock: $40k (4 Years)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~45LPA

Company: **Wayfair**
Title/Level: SDE2
Base: 42LPA
Relocation bonus: 0L
Signing Bonus: 2L
Stock: 0
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~44LPA

Company: **CapitalOne**
Title/Level: Senior Associate
Base: 38LPA
Relocation bonus: 0L
Signing Bonus: 2L
Bonus: 6L - 12L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 46 ~ 52 LPA

Company: **OCI**
Title/Level: IC3
Base: 39LPA
Signing Bonus: 3L
Stock Bonus: 14L/year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~56LPA

Got these offers in this sequence in last 1 month. 1 month of notice period is still pending. I am looking for companies with good work and good wlb. Anyone working in these company can help with the work culture.
Heard from friends that oci wlb is not good. I am leaning more towards Wayfair or CapitalOne if I dont get any FAANG or better offer in next 1 month.

title: Flipkart vs 6sense vs INDMoney vs US-Startup | SDE-2 | Bengaluru
content:
Hi community ,
Education: Tier 2
Years of Experience: 3
Prior Experience: Startup

First Offer
Company: 6sense
Location: Bangalore / Hybrid
Title/Level: SDE-3
Fixed Salary: ₹ 32L
Joining Bonus: ₹ 0
RSU: 5750 RSUs
Target Bonus: 15% of Fixed Salary
Total Comp: (Salary + Bonus +PF): ₹ 36.8L + 5750 RSUs
Date of offer:July2024

Second offer:
Company: Flipkart
Location: Bangalore / Hybrid
Title/Level: SDE-2
Fixed Salary: ₹ 30
Joining Bonus: ₹0
Target Bonus: 10% of Fixed Salary
Stock options: ₹ 14L
Total Comp: (Salary + Bonus +PF+ Stock): ₹ 47L
Date of offer:July2024

Third offer:
Company: INDMoney
Location: Gurugram
Title/Level: SDE-2
Fixed Salary: ₹ 28
Joining Bonus: ₹0
Target Bonus: 15% of Fixed Salary
Total Comp: (Salary + Bonus +PF+ Stock): ₹ 32.2L
Date of offer:July2024

Fourth offer:
Company: US-based startup
Location: Bangalore / Hybrid
Title/Level: SDE-2
Fixed Salary: ₹ 33L
Joining Bonus: ₹1L
RSU: 8000 RSUs
Total Comp: (Salary + Bonus +PF+ Stock): ₹ 34L + 8000RSUs
Date of offer:July2024


I am in dilemma on what should i consider.
I want to go to US-based startup as it has a lot of growth opportunity due to ownership and responsibility
 Please help me in which company to prefer
